President Obama rips Donald Trump's views on using "radical Islam" as a betrayal of America's values, saying that the use of the phrase "radical islam" will only strengthen ISIS's and other terrorist groups' efforts to be viewed as representatives of the entire religion. 
 Reflect on Twitter http://www.twitter.com/ReflectVideo 
 Reflect on Facebook http://on.fb.me/1Oi1dbH
Louie \(Tv Series 2010-\)\n Created by Louis C.K.. With Louis C.K., Hadley Delany, Ursula Parker, Pamela Adlon. The life of Louis CK, a divorced comedian with two kids living in New York.
